content:
# Report

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(2.5, 2.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Electric poles at positions (2.5, 2.5) and (0.5, 1.5)

### Lab at position(3.5, 0.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Lab (status: No Power) at position (3.5, 0.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (fuel: coal, status: No Ingredients) at position (0, 0)
- Furnace (fuel: coal, status: No Ingredients) at position (2, 0)

### Storage at position(3.5, 0.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Wooden chest (status: Normal) at position (3.5, 0.5)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing new electric poles
- Ensure that the first argument is a valid Prototype object before attempting to place a new pole.

### Errors when the lab is not powered
- Check the power supply to the lab and ensure it is connected to a power source.

### Errors when research cannot be completed
- Ensure you have the required ingredients (e.g., 10 automation science packs) in your inventory to complete the research.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.
